statements: SELECT * FROM DonorDemographics ORDER BY donor_id DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_age FROM DonorDemographics WHERE donor_gender='Male';
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM DonorDemographics WHERE donor_age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT donor_gender FROM DonorDemographics;
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM DonorDemographics ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_age FROM DonorDemographics WHERE donor_id = 100
SELECT * FROM DonorDemographics WHERE donor_age > 30 ORDER BY donor_name ASC
SELECT donor_name, donor_gender, donation_amount FROM DonorDemographics WHERE donation_amount >= 500 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM DonorDemographics WHERE donor_gender = 'Female' AND donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date ASC
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donor_age, donor_gender FROM DonorDemographics WHERE donor_age BETWEEN 25 AND 50
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donor_age FROM donors WHERE donor_gender='Male';
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors WHERE donor_age > 30 ORDER BY donor_age DESC;
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100 ORDER BY donation_date ASC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_location FROM donors WHERE donor_location LIKE '%USA%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT donor_name, donor_age FROM donors WHERE donor_id=1;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name, donor_location FROM donors ORDER BY donor_age DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_gender, donor_location FROM donors WHERE donor_age >= 30 AND donor_gender='Female';
SELECT donation_id, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donors.donor_id, donors.donor_name, donations.donation_amount FROM donors INNER JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id WHERE donations.donation_amount > 500;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM donors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT donor_id, first_name, last_name, donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id;
SELECT donor_id, COUNT(donation_id) AS donation_count FROM donations GROUP BY donor_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_id = 123 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM donors WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';

SELECT d.first_name, d.last_name, SUM(dn.donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donors d JOIN donations dn ON d.donor_id = dn.donor_id GROUP BY d.first_name, d.last_name ORDER BY total_donation DESC;
SELECT * FROM donors;
SELECT donor_name, donor_age, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donor_gender = 'M';
SELECT donor_name, donor_age, donor_location FROM donors INNER JOIN demographics ON donors.donor_id = demographics.donor_id;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_goal, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_goal DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_age, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donor_age > 30 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_name, donor_gender, donation_amount FROM donors WHERE donor_gender='M' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_goal, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_goal > 1000 ORDER BY start_date, campaign_goal DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donor_location, donor_interests FROM donors JOIN demographics ON donors.donor_id = demographics.donor_id WHERE donor_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY donor_name;

SELECT donors.donor_name, campaigns.campaign_name, donations.donation_amount FROM donors JOIN donations ON donors.donor_id = donations.donor_id JOIN campaigns ON donations.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id ORDER BY donations.donation_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM donor_demographics;
SELECT donor_name, donor_age, donor_gender FROM donor_demographics WHERE donor_age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM fundraising_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donor_demographics d JOIN donation_history dh ON d.donor_id = dh.donor_id;
SELECT campaign_name, total_donation_amount, total_donors_count FROM fundraising_campaigns fc JOIN campaign_performance cp ON fc.campaign_id = cp.campaign_id WHERE total_donors_count > 50;
SELECT donor_name, donor_age, donor_gender FROM donor_demographics
SELECT * FROM donation_history ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT donor_name, donor_age, donation_amount FROM donor_demographics JOIN donation_history ON donor_demographics.donor_id = donation_history.donor_id
SELECT * FROM fundraising_campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date > CURRENT_DATE
SELECT campaign_name, total_donation_amount, total_donors_count FROM fundraising_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance ON fundraising_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id
